text.section: A senior center site council may conduct billiards in a senior center 5 days per week, excluding Sunday.
A senior center site council may not award a prize of money to a winner exceeding $5 in each session.

section.section: A senior center site council may conduct a billiards tournament with a maximum entry fee of $2 for each participant.
Prizes of money may be awarded to first, second, and third place winners from the entry fee money collected.
All money that remains after prizes are awarded shall be distributed to the senior center site council.
